val:
The Flower Collective is a cannabis company based out of Nederland, CO that specializes in pre rolled joints, blunts and concentrates.

When I first saw their products in person I was blown away by the vibrant packaging and quality of the pre rolls.

When shooting theses photos it was my goal to highlight the quality of the product via clean and minimal lighting in the studio.

When shooting in the wild the goal was to capture the active and local lifestyle the brand markets around.
